game.title: Rat Problem
game.objective: Exterminate the rats in the Tavern's basement.
game.description: The tavern owner is having a rat problem in the basement. He has asked you to deal with them.

task.description: The tavern's basement is located behind the bar.
The rats are located in the basement. Use any weapon you like to kill them.

task.objective: Report back to the Tavern owner.
task.description: Once you have killed all the rats, return to the tavern owner and tell him the good news.
